nodes.title: Consistent catalog builders + move recipe registration
Update channel buf for netty buffer changes.
Fix abstract data inconsistencies and issues.
Add method to get the temperature at a specific position
Use null check from internal java library
add primary interaction Slot to ClickInventoryEvent
Fix flowpowered links - site is down
Replace integer ticks durations with Duration across the API.
Add features specific to Shulkers, ShulkerBullets and ShulkerBoxes.
Expose static methods for plugins to detect whether they're running on Forge or Vanilla
Quality of Life updates for the current command API
Change SkinData to use a custom ProfileProperty
Annotate ExpireEntityEvent to generate a factory method.
Open Inventory with different display name
Move the BlockState matcher impl to impl
Move the VoidWorldGeneratorModifier to the impl.
Allow Entity deaths to be Cancellable
add original and final slot info to ChangeInventoryEvent.Held
Fix unsafe copy method for Location
Improve the effects API. Added SoundEffect.
Add new functions to replace stopFilter and skipFilter
Update Chest API for new merging logic.
Fix missing supplier overload for persisted biome type in VirtualBiomeType
Add new features to trade offers [API8].
Add supplier overloads to all builder methods and trait -> property
Add DataValues to the BlockEntities where they belong. [API-8]
Add missing data values to ItemFrame, Sheep and Vex.
Move Spellcaster getters to keys and add missing value accessor for enderman screaming
Add useful methods to RailDirection and LogAxis interfaces
Add missing entity data values, Sittable and Spawner
Add TropicalFishShape Catalog and Data values to Tropical Fish.
Add new 1.14 Merchant, Raid and Villager related features. #2068 #2069
[Draft] Add new 1.14 Merchant, Raid and Villager related features. #2068 #2069
Fix missing in string -> catalog key migration
Make TradeOfferGenerator extend a BiFunction instead to handle 1.14 implementation.
Updates to the Command API to support implementation
Fix issues tab completing nested SequenceCommandElements
[API8] Allow regular gradle dsl to have spongeapi's kotlin dsl subproject
Slight refactor of SimpleDispatcher to support SpongePowered/SpongeCommon#2385
Add ability to change potion color
Ensure command completion checks source permission
Give permissions integer values to allow weighting
Add possibility to remove a child at an index
Fix PlayerCommandElement autocompletion and enhance CommandArgs
Added Data manipulator/Keys for Disabled Slots in an ArmorStand.
Allow GroundCoverLayers to vary depth based on Y position.
Channel API Improvements + Client login phase
[WIP] Entity API refactor and BlockEntities for 1.14
Remove the CommandSource in favour of Causes.
Play with builders for goal and such
Migrate from jsr305 to checker framework
Simplification of the Unified Data API (Data API v4)
Improve the weather API to support local weathers based on biomes, etc.
Move all the plugin object arguments to PluginContainer
Use CatalogKey for custom channel names
Do not append spaces after CommandElements whose usages are empty.
Replace Duration with Ticks where it makes sense to do so.
Add missing locked field in Score class
Add MANY_GAME_PROFILES parameter, repurpose GAME_PROFILE to only return one.
Allow ValueCompleters to filter based on input string
command: Add helper methods for building flags
build: fix guice exclusion for configurate
Add ability to get Command.Parameterized from CommandContext (#2217)
Update Key JavaDocs + Rename SlabPortions.FULL -> DOUBLE
Refactor the GameProfileManager and make GameProfile immutable.
Add method to send updated command tree to a player
Add an API method to access the Minecraft DataVersion
States cannot be cataloged so a backup system.
Change GameProfileManager method signature to return a map
Move ban classes to ban package
Deprecate unused elements of the KickPlayerEvent
text: Support reading DataContainer text format from Configurate
Add support for non-Sponge/Brig client completions.
Add ability to programmatically create selectors
Set the default value for sharedRoot to false in ConfigDir and DefaultConfig
Create a SubjectProxy and separate CommandCause from CommandContext
Remove the concept of read-only orders
Add exception handlers for the network channel.
Redo some of the Parameter.Key generics
RegisterCommandEvent now acts on commands, not registrars (specifically)
Use a double for damage related keys.
Allow Plugins to Mutate XP for Block Breaks & Entity Deaths
Rename fields again to match registry names.
Return generic type E extends Engine in EngineLifecycleEvent instead of Engine
Remove Cause parameters from Account methods
Drop modifier templates. And remove attribute that was added in a later version of the game. Match registry names
Add a key which specifies if a player has viewed the credits
Add marker for classes that should not be stored
Add a way to get all unique and virtual accounts from the economy service
[API-8] Reroute BlockSnapshot#empty into a factory, and add misc missing javadocs
[API-8] Allow resolving of CatalogKeys with custom default namespaces.
[API-8] Adjust NamedCatalogType and NamedCatalogBuilder interfaces for expectations
[API-8] Add direction methods on Entity and Living
Clarify some stuff with Server players on a server
Add .entities in EntityVolume, lift from ServerWorld
wip on automatically adding main classes to the plugins.json
Add UNKNOWN portal type, make generatePortal return a boolean
Adjustments to Chunk and World interfaces
Add an event to be fired when the game is performing its final shutdown
Remove the restriction that listener methods must be public
Add shorthand value fetchers to DataTransactionResult
Add missing/move/fix default data methods of all entities
[API-8] Make TabListEntry serializable, untether from TabList
Allow the Registry Entry parameter to scan multiple registry holders.
Switch to using event-impl-gen in its AP form
build: Use convention plugin, standard GH actions workflows
Initial update of block states & block entities for 1.17
Fix contributor guidelines link in CONTIRBUTING.md
Purge the TypeTokens constant holder class
Rename SIDEBAR_TEAM_NO_COLOR to SIDEBAR, allow getting DisplaySlot by team colour
Move timings to it's own library
Update for dropping get prefix in plugin-meta/-spi
build: Bump to gradle 7, accomodate changes in impl
Add ClientSuggestionProvider to add client-based suggestions for things like biomes
Add recipe, biome, and sound ClientCompletionKeys
Rename methods that don't do well without "get" to "findX/findXOrCreate"
Add ParticleOptions.SCALE back to the API
Fixing minor typos in CommandRegistrar JavaDocs
Add missing throws to Favicon.Factory methods
Add getter for effective plugin data collection state
Drop get prefixes from almost all things
Add support for ResourceKey in advancement background
Change TextComponent in MapDecoration Builder -> Component
adventure: Expose component resolution to API
Getters getters getters get your getters here!
Some minor tweaks to the Commands API
Pushes default Parameter handling to the CommandContext Implementation
Refactor Schematic API for improved Registries
[WIP] Just brainstorming ideas for further registry work.
Remove AABB implementation from the API
Refactor ChangeBlockEvent with All, Post, and Pre
Add keys for data from client settings
Add missing locked field in Score class
